query: SELECT productId, name, description, particleSize, poreSize, columnLength, innerDiameter, LEFT(detailedDescription, 100) as desc_preview FROM products WHERE brand = 'Merck' LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT productId, name, description, particleSize, poreSize, columnLength, innerDiameter, LEFT(detailedDescription, 100) as desc_preview FROM products WHERE brand = 'Merck' LIMIT 5
